name: Space Degraders,
description:
is an Action Sidescroller made by Team DevRow and WormjuiceDev who joined the team for the JernJam2022.

You and your trusty spaceship have had a mission and you were like 
"wep wep wep.... moob moob... wep wep... moob"
01100101 01101101 01101001 01110100 00100000 01110011 01100101 01101111 01100111 00100000 01110100 01110010 01110010 01110010 01100010
And all in a span of minutes!

Watch the gameplay video (which is playing in reverse!)
